SVGPointList.summary: The SVGPointList interface represents a list of objects.

remarks.para: An SVGPointList can be designated as read-only, which means that attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.

SVGPointListAppendItem.summary: The appendItem() method of the interface adds a to the end of the list.

SVGPointListClear.summary: The clear() method of the interface removes all items from the list.

SVGPointListGetItem.summary: The getItem() method of the interface gets one item from the list at the specified index.

SVGPointListInitialize.summary: The initialize() method of the interface clears the list then adds a single new object to the list.

SVGPointListInsertItemBefore.summary: The insertItemBefore() method of the interface inserts a before another item in the list.

SVGPointListLength.summary: The length read-only property of the interface returns the number of items in the list.
SVGPointListLength.value: The number of items in the list.

SVGPointListNumberOfItems.summary: The numberOfItems read-only property of the interface returns the number of items in the list.
SVGPointListNumberOfItems.value: The number of items in the list.

SVGPointListRemoveItem.summary: The removeItem() method of the interface removes a from the list.

SVGPointListReplaceItem.summary: The replaceItem() method of the interface replaces a in the list.
